message: Name,

You are invited to our very first CLE Accredited Justia Webinar! On March 15 at 2:00pm ET/11:00am PT, JurisPro Expert Witness Directory President Jim Robinson will offer a virtual CLE and webinar opportunity on Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses* exclusively for Justia Connect members.
One hour of general California MCLE credit is offered as an exclusive Justia Connect Pro benefit. Other jurisdictions may award credit case-by-case through the self-submission process.
If you are not a Justia Connect Pro but wish to attend this webinar for CLE credit, you can upgrade to Pro for only $19.99/month at connect.justia.com/pro.
Not a Justia Connect Pro? You can still learn from a leader in expert witness research!
note: *This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

message: Name,

If you want ethics and advertising info, you won't want to miss Fast Mover Advantage: Law Marketing Ethics Issues in a Race for Clients* on Wednesday, March 15 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT! Attorney and President of HTMlawyers Micah Buchdahl will explore the legal ethics surrounding attorney advertising in today's increasingly fast-paced market.
All Justia Connect members are invited to join us for this free webinar!
note: Alert: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive one hour of California legal ethics MCLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

message: Name,

Just a few seats remain for our next Justia Webinar, and we want you to experience it! Take advantage of this opportunity to join Attorney and President of HTMlawyers Micah Buchdahl as he leads Justia in an exploration of legal marketing ethics, including:
list:
• Bates v. Arizona
  • Virtual Law Practices
  • Advertising Ethics
  • The Rules of Professional Conduct
  • And More!
message2: Alert: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive one hour of California legal ethics MCLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of legal ethics MCLE credit in California.

message: In just a few hours, we'll be connecting with you at the Justia Webinars presentation Fast Mover Advantage: Law Marketing Ethics Issues in a Race for Clients.*
Reminders:
Your personalized Zoom access link has been sent to your email inbox. If you cannot locate this link, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

All Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, but only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.

Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 12:00 p.m. PT on Friday, March 17, 2023.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Hi Name,
Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.

As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members in the year to come, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Hi Name,
You recently registered for our recent Justia Webinars presentation Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses, but weren’t able to join us. We missed having you with us on presentation day!
Things come up and life happens. We get it! If possible, could you take a few moments to tell us why you were unable to attend this webinar?
Your feedback matters as we continue to improve Justia Webinars and plan future events for Justia Connect members. Our team appreciates it more than you know!
